sentences.en: " It's such an interesting walk. He's at the Madison Square. "
sentences.cn: “ 这样走去很有意思, 他在麦迪逊广场演出. ”

sentences.en: " There's a nice fellow, " Drouet thought to himself as he turned the corner towards Madison.
sentences.cn: “ 真 是个好人, " 杜洛埃转身朝麦迪生街走去,一边心里这么想.

sentences.en: " They're doing a piece on covered bridges , and Madison County , Iowa, apparently has some interesting ones.
sentences.cn: “ 他们要发表一篇关于廊桥的文章, 显然依阿华的麦迪逊县的几座满有意思的这样的桥.

sentences.en: After a time he gave up waiting and drearily headed for the Madison car.
sentences.cn: 过了一会儿,他放弃了等待,无精打采地到麦迪生大道坐街车.

sentences.en: At one o'clock he thought of eating, and went to a restaurant in Madison Square.
sentences.cn: 1点钟时,他想吃饭了, 便走进麦迪逊广场的一家餐馆.

sentences.en: But if you live in a little town like Madison, Wisconsin, there is, really, no red eye.
sentences.cn: 但是如果你住在一些小城镇，例如威斯康星州的麦迪逊，那里连红眼航班都没有。

sentences.en: But Madison County was home now, and she had no longing to go back'again.
sentences.cn: 但现在麦迪逊县已是她的家, 她不想再回去了.

sentences.en: I ask myself over and over, " What happened to me in Madison County, Iowa? "
sentences.cn: 我一遍又一遍问我自己, “ 我在依阿华的麦迪逊究竟遇到了什么事? ”

sentences.en: If a new person moved into Madison County, they would know within a week if he or she was a Democrat or a Republican.
sentences.cn: 如果一个人刚刚搬到麦迪逊县，那么不出一个星期，他们就会知道此人是民主党人还是共和党人。
麦迪逊大街也好不了多少.

sentences.en: Marilyn made her last public appearance at Madison Square Garden.
sentences.cn: 玛丽莲最后一次公开亮相是在麦迪逊广场花园。

sentences.en: Night had come to Madison County.
On his bench in Madison Square Soapy moved uneasily.
sentences.cn: 索比急躁不安地躺在麦迪逊广场的长凳上,辗转反侧.

sentences.en: On Monday morning Jemmy sauntered on the road of Madison Square.
sentences.cn: 星期一的上午杰米还在麦迪逊广场的马路上闲逛。

sentences.en: P . S . , The photo project in Madison County turned out fine.
sentences.cn: 又及:在麦县拍的那组照片效果很好.

sentences.en: People in Madison County didn't talk this way, about these things.
sentences.cn: 麦县的人从来不这么谈话, 不谈这些事.

sentences.en: We window - shopped along Madison Avenue.
sentences.cn: 我们沿着麦迪生大道逛商店.

phrases.tran_cn: 詹姆斯·麦迪逊（美国前总统）
美国广告业；美国广告业作风；麦德逊大道（美国广告业中心）
麦迪逊广场花园（美国纽约曼哈顿的一个大型室内运动场）

trans.tran_cn: 麦迪逊（姓氏； 美国城市）
